text: This is a list of universities in the Cayman Islands: *Cayman Islands Law School: A law school affiliated with the University of Liverpool in the U.K. *International College of the Cayman Islands: A private university. *St. Matthews University: A private institution containing a medical school and a veterinary school. *University College of the Cayman Islands: The only public university in the Cayman Islands. *University of the West Indies (Open Campus): Affiliated with UWI Jamaica. http://www.open.uwi.edu/cayman_islands *Cayman Institute of Technology: http://cit.edu.ky Cayman Islands Universities List Category:Universities in the Cayman Islands Cayman Islands Cayman Islands
title: List of universities in the Cayman Islands
